title: 今天来说说一个话题:mc到底给你带来了什么。
author: xiao_mai
txt_content: 楼主觉的mc这个游戏或许在某些方面做的真的不怎么好但是它带来的东西却远比那些所谓的高端游戏带来的多。

replies.author: 1qw223
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 1qw223
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: Near0
replies.txt_content: 欢乐，游戏嘛

replies.author: 音乐家七月天
replies.txt_content: 最简单的当然是它所带来的乐趣。

replies.author: wwbzxp002
replies.txt_content: ????大多数缺陷可以依靠mod来弥补…

replies.author: wwbzxp002
replies.txt_content: 大多数缺陷可以让mod弥补233

replies.author: simon3000
replies.txt_content: 我觉得MC算是一个高端游戏了
腐竹：带来了财富

replies.author: 御殇城c
replies.txt_content:
除了快乐，还要朋友
友谊

replies.author: 武王撞钟
replies.txt_content: 闲暇时我总算有事情做了，玩mcpe

replies.author: linzi1034
replies.txt_content: 给我带来了情商

replies.author: Ba_bb
replies.txt_content: 快乐  友谊

replies.author: mmt530694
replies.txt_content: 给我带来创造思维

replies.author: ssy2014
replies.txt_content:
1.有事做
2.创造性
3.好玩

replies.author: 千城之殇
replies.txt_content:
快乐
朋友

replies.author: Donnies_Ming
replies.txt_content:
颈椎病
糟糕生活的句号（引用晚餐骨名言）

replies.author: 灰常可乐
replies.txt_content: 带来了欢乐~

replies.author: PotatoMaster101
replies.txt_content: MC带来了编程的乐趣

replies.author: 万能de小黑
replies.txt_content: MC带来了杯具的成绩啊。。。容易上瘾。。。

replies.author: fiyhouse
replies.txt_content: 多花钱了（玩了之后得了MC孤独症）

replies.author: MRTangwin8
replies.txt_content:
给我带来了一个游戏的乐趣
Minecraft的确影响到了我的情绪

replies.author: 我是基岩
replies.txt_content: minecaft它走向了我，于是，我拥有了现在！
